description:
Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Death's Fathom:

Your Fireball, Frostbolt, and Arcane Blast have a chance to grant Deathborne for 8 sec. While in the form of a skeletal mage the spell damage granted is increased by 1% for each enemy hit by Fireball, Frostbolt, and Arcane Blast.
Equip: While Icy Veins is active, each Frostbolt you cast reduces the cast time of Frostbolt by 2% and increases its damage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Elemental Conduit:

Up to 5 friendly targets healed by Chain Harvest will have Riptide cast on them. Up to 5 enemy targets damaged by Chain Harvest will have Flame Shock cast on them. Flame Shock critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Chain Harvest by 1.0 sec.
Equip: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 3%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 20 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Word of Glory will automatically trigger Light of Dawn.

Equip: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards. All allies within your Light of Dawn benefit from Mastery: Lightbringer as though they were within 10 yards for 8 sec.

Word of Glory receives 50% increased benefit from your Mastery.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Shadow Bolt increases the damage of your Demonbolt by 15%, stacking up to 4 times. Lasts 20 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shard of Annihilation:

Decimating Bolt also increases the critical strike chance by 100% and critical strike damage by 50% for Incinerate.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pouch of Razor Fragments:

Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shard of Annihilation:

Decimating Bolt also increases the critical strike chance by 100% and critical strike damage by 50% for Demonbolt.
Equip: Shadow Bolt increases the damage of your Demonbolt by 15%, stacking up to 4 times. Lasts 20 sec.
Equip: For every 15 seconds that you do not cast Shadow Mend, the healing of your next Shadow Mend is increased by 50%.  This effect can stack up to 4 times.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pallid Command:

Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 792 Shadow damage.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bwonsamdi's Pact:

Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Unbridled Swarm:

Adaptive Swarm has a 60% chance to split into two Swarms each time it jumps.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Templar's Verdict will automatically trigger Divine Storm.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 7,928 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Heart of the Fae:

Shifting Power can be channeled while moving. Each enemy hit by Shifting Power grants you 1% Critical Strike and Haste, up to 10% for 15 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

When Sepsis expires on your target you gain Adrenaline Rush and Shadow Blades for 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Abomination's Frenzy:

Abomination Limb's duration is increased by 4 sec and the frequency it grants Runic Corruption is increased by 2 sec. The first time an enemy is damaged by Abomination Limb they take 20% increased damage from you for 12 sec.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
